layer.name: Order
layer.definition: An arrangement that displays the relationship between elements via a particular sequence, pattern, or method; the belief that reality is intelligible, structured, and meaningful rather than chaotic and random.

questions.text: I believe reality is ordered and intelligible â€” it can be studied, understood, and predicted.
I believe knowledge is possible because there are patterns in reality waiting to be discovered.
I see evidence of order in the success of science, mathematics, and logic in describing reality.
I reject the idea that reality is fundamentally chaotic, unknowable, or meaningless.
I believe clear thinking is possible because reality itself has clarity and structure.
